item.description:
Discover how to eat more and weigh less at the upcoming Healthy Holiday Cooking Class, led by Shayna Ashton, former cook at the award-winning Country Life Buffet in Boston. You will learn how to enjoy great Christmas meals without guilt or weight gain.

 

Ms. Ashton will demonstrate how to make delicious, low-fat recipes, including Tofu Turkey Roll with Stuffing served with Gravy, Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Mock Tuna Salad in a mini pepper, and Apple Strudel with Glaze.

  

The seminar will be hosted at the Better Living Center, 2 Airport Drive, in Worcester (near Mill/Chandler corner), Monday, December 12, 6:30 – 8:30 p.m.

There is no charge, but kindly RSVP by calling (508) 243-1289,

or Facebook – Community Health Group –Shrewsbury, or by email:  morninglightwpep@yahoo.com.

 

The program is a community service of the Seventh-day Adventist Church.
item.name: Healthy Holiday Cooking Class
